title: Daniel Jones Future, Dark Horse MVP, Joe Burrow Celebrating, and Lamar Jackson Contract
itunes:title: Daniel Jones Future, Dark Horse MVP, Joe Burrow Celebrating, and Lamar Jackson Contract
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with pressure on Giants QB Daniel Jones. Hosts Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, Jane Slater, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson put together a checklist of 'needs' for Jones to remain in NYC.  With The Preakness on Saturday, the crew gives their dark horse MVP picks before discussing the viral video of ambidextrous QB Mikey Gow. We hear Joe Burrow explain how a Kurt Warner soundbite helped him celebrate following a loss in the Super Bowl.  The table debates if Lamar Jackson should push harder for a contract extension then we celebrate Kyle's son getting his first hit in Little League.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
